text:
Fans Take Madhavan’s Look For ‘Rocketry: The Nambi Effect’ To Meme Town & The Results Are Epic!
Fans Take Madhavan’s Look For ‘Rocketry: The Nambi Effect’ To Meme Town & The Results Are Epic!
From Maddy the charmer in Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein to his rough and tough avatar in Saala Khadoos, R Madhavan has always surprised his massive fan following playing distinct roles. The man who, with just one picture (remember his shower selfie?), can make women go weak in their knees, is all set to surprise us all in his next film titled Rocketry: The Nambi Effect.
Instagram
R Madhavan is not only donning a director’s hat, but he is also playing the lead role of legendary ISRO scientist S Nambi Narayanan, who was wrongly accused a spy.
A couple of days ago, R Madhavan showcased how he has transformed for to play the role of Nambi Narayanan. He looked uncannily similar to the 48-year-old actor. So much so, he left all his fans to believe that he was a doppelganger. Take a look!
Don't Miss 745 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES
And just like everything that trends on internet, this picture of R Madhavan also became a viral meme. The results are indeed hilarious. Take a look at this hilarious version of #10YearChallenge.
#1
*when you're 25 and unmarried at family function.*
1) How you really look .
2) How your relatives see you . pic.twitter.com/1FaWyd4gpQ — Aditii🎀 (@Sassy_Soul_) January 23, 2019
#2

finish MBBS, MD,
fellowships pic.twitter.com/LBIoksFpyu — DR. GILL (@ikpsgill1) January 23, 2019
#3
Make goa plan. Finally Going. pic.twitter.com/R6coJAjAm2 — Pranjul Sharma 🌞 (@Pranjultweet) January 23, 2019
#4
*phone call*
she: ek second hold karo pic.twitter.com/A9y5xBedhZ — Maithun - HMP (@Being_Humor) January 23, 2019
#5
Waiting for SRK Hit Film 😰 pic.twitter.com/3hlcrMS3ys — Virender Sehwag (@SirURFake) January 23, 2019
#6
1) started doing CA
2) when you complete CA pic.twitter.com/bICcekfGOd — ¯_(ツ)_/¯ (@shubhh_jain) January 23, 2019
#7

#8

became became
Lover. Poet... https://t.co/UdiY1qmoZ4 — ÐΛ (@AliveInCoffin) January 23, 2019
#9
1) texted
2) waiting for her reply pic.twitter.com/zTeBK7RFRG — ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ ㅤㅤ ㅤ ㅤ ㅤ (@firkiii) January 23, 2019
#10
Waiting for Vodafone executive to pick up your phone... pic.twitter.com/qyJgrDBAfq — Devil (@Baredevil_) January 23, 2019

When Afridi When Afridi
played his first played his last
international international match match pic.twitter.com/tWwj7MQiwv — keetaANU Malik (@VirusUncle) January 23, 2019
#12
Marwadi deciding to do something else apart from going to dukan. pic.twitter.com/ZXCQM9kAdd — Akshay | ಅಕ್ಷಯ | अक्षय (@AkshayKatariyaa) January 23, 2019
#13
1. Waiting for a decision on Pandya and Rahul

Vs
Final year in JNU pic.twitter.com/Y8fBq7ri1S — Desi Mojito (@desimojito) January 23, 2019
#15
Three stages of life-
1. You believe in Santa.
2. You don't believe in Santa.
3. You become Santa. pic.twitter.com/SCioTH2EII — The Sarcastic Jerk (@The_Sarcastic_J) January 23, 2019
R Madhavan’s Rocketry: The Nambi Effect will be released in English, Hindi and Tamil.
title: The Nambi Effect’ To Meme-Town & The Results Are Hilarious

The man who, with just one picture (remember his shower selfie?), can make women go weak in their knees, is all set to surprise us all in his next film titled Rocketry: The Nambi Effect.
